Text:
I can't thank you enough for your responsiveness. You have some kind of library to draw from!

I will love this no matter what the quality, for me it's all about story!

sad to say, the video won't play all the way through. It gives error messages when one starts it up, it will start, but will play most o the way through then stop. Really appreciate the effort, though!

To robot-TPB.

So sorry ! Apparently, the movie seemed to be playing OK with BSPlayer, which I use generally preferably to VLC.

I'm looking into the problem and be back to you soon.
for me it plays ok till 1:11 then no more. Let me know if you can play it to the credits. thx again
There seems to be approximately 20min missing at the end.  The movie stops at 1hr 11min 35sec, same result using VLC/GOM/MPC players.

While you're absorbing this information, pirpawn, how about another request that I would be astonished if you found:
Slaughter on Tenth Avenue (1957)
